## Compilation specs
For the latest distributed version

- for Windows :
    - VM Windows 10, 32 bits (host Ubuntu 18.04, VirtualBox)
    - Qt 5.14.1
    - qmake 3.1
    - mingw 7.3


- for Linux :
    - Ubuntu 20.04, 64 bit
    - Qt 5.9.5
    - qmake 3.1
    - gcc 9.3.0


No specific setup was done: QtCreator can successfully compile the project with no other settings than `src/Sorts.pro`
